name: DacpacBranchBuildCompare
description: Provides a report on database model changes when compared to the last build for the specified branch
author: Kerwin Carpede

inputs.name: DacpacFileName
inputs.label: Dacpac File Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the name dacpac to compare. It is expected that the dacpac file names should be identical

inputs.name: DacpacPath
inputs.label: Dacpac File Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the dacpac path in the current build

inputs.name: Branch
inputs.label: Target Branch Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the branch to compare to

inputs.name: ArtifactDropName
inputs.label: Artifact Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the name of the artifact in the target branch

inputs.name: CompareDirectory
inputs.label: Compare Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the name of the artifact in the target branch

inputs.name: ReportDirectory
inputs.label: Report Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the name of the artifact in the target branch

inputs.name: SqlPackagePath
inputs.label: SqlPackage Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the DacFx SqlPackage.exe command line utility

inputs.name: extraArgs
inputs.label: Extra SQLPackage args
inputs.helpMarkDown: Extra args to use for running the SQLPackage.exe schema compare command.
